editions.flavor: As the clash in Azoth intensified, many wondered: could an Oasis truly exist in a world where the line between rebellion and liberation was blurred?

effect: **On Enter:** **Glimpse 6**. Draw six cards. Then **summon** a Spirit Shard token.
effect_raw: On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Then summon a Spirit Shard token.
flavor: Fissures skate across Flagma's mantle. Gouts of flame torch the Oasis. Uncontrollable magma spills forth as the fragmented leyline burns itself to a cinder.
name: Fragmented Spirit of Fire

result_editions.flavor: As the clash in Azoth intensified, many wondered: could an Oasis truly exist in a world where the line between rebellion and liberation was blurred?

effect_html: On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Then summon a Spirit Shard token.

editions.flavor: History encased in ice, thawing to unveil the past many sought to erase. A chilling reminder that alchemical revelations often come at a price.

effect: **On Enter:** **Glimpse 6**. Draw six cards. Then **summon** a Spirit Shard token.
effect_raw: On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Then summon a Spirit Shard token.
flavor: Relentless hail stabs the frozen air. Hoarfrost chokes Krustal of life. Crystalline daggers of ice form from the deluge of rain as the fragmented leyline shatters.
name: Fragmented Spirit of Water

result_editions.flavor: History encased in ice, thawing to unveil the past many sought to erase. A chilling reminder that alchemical revelations often come at a price.

effect_html: On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Then summon a Spirit Shard token.

editions.flavor: The winds of change brought with them turbulence and strife. Only once these gusts were properly harnessed could true transformation take shape.

effect: **On Enter:** **Glimpse 6**. Draw six cards. Then **summon** a Spirit Shard token.
effect_raw: On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Then summon a Spirit Shard token.
flavor: The thunderclouds darken above. Windscream pierces through the barriers of Winbless. Tempests of madness drive the fragmented leyline to the brink.
name: Fragmented Spirit of Wind

result_editions.flavor: The winds of change brought with them turbulence and strife. Only once these gusts were properly harnessed could true transformation take shape.

effect_html: On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Then summon a Spirit Shard token.

effect:
**Fast Activation**, **Ranged 2**

[Class Bonus] [Level 2+] **On Enter:** Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may activate a Ranger action card with reserve cost 2 or less from among them without paying its costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
effect_raw:
Fast Activation, Ranged 2

[Class Bonus] [Level 2+] On Enter: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may activate a Ranger action card with reserve cost 2 or less from among them without paying its costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

rule.description: Cards revealed off of Bertha's effect check the printed cost on the card and do not consider any cost changing or setting.

effect:
[Arisanna Bonus] **Brew** — Four Herbs with different names

[REST]**:** Draw a card into your memory. If CARDNAME was **brewed**, the next time an astra element source you control would deal damage to one or more units this turn, it deals that much damage plus 3 to those units instead.
effect_raw:
[Arisanna Bonus] Brew — Four Herbs with different names

REST: Draw a card into your memory. If Prima Materia was brewed, the next time an astra element source you control would deal damage to one or more units this turn, it deals that much damage plus 3 to those units instead.
name: Prima Materia

rule.description: An astra element source includes any object or card that is astra element.

effect:
[Diana Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate.

Draw 3+**X** cards, where **X** is the amount of Curse cards in your champion's lineage minus your **influence**. *(If the amount of cards you would draw is negative, don't draw any cards.)*
effect_raw:
[Diana Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate.

Draw 3+X cards, where X is the amount of Curse cards in your champion's lineage minus your influence. (If the amount of cards you would draw is negative, don't draw any cards.)
flavor: For justice, she was willing to take any means necessary, even if it meant embrace darkness.
name: Accursed Strength

rule.description: X can be negative, but the amount of cards to be drawn cannot be negative. If a player is instructed to draw a negative amount of cards, they don't draw any cards.

effect_html: Diana Bonus This card costs 1 less to activate.Draw 3+X cards, where X is the amount of Curse cards in your champion's lineage minus your influence. (If the amount of cards you would draw is negative, don't draw any cards.)

effect:
**Command Automaton** *(An Automaton ally you control performs this attack.)*

Command Automaton (An Automaton ally you control performs this attack.)

On Attack: Summon a Powercell token rested. Then each opponent banishes X cards from their graveyard, where X is the amount of Powercells you control.
flavor: As the automaton army grew, so did their empathy–and with it, their desire for belonging.
name: Charged Directive

rule.description: If the ally rested to pay for the cost of the Command card dies before the activation resolves, the Command card will fizzle and not start a combat phase.
The eligible ally that was rested to pay for activating the Command card is the one that will declare the attack upon the card's resolution.
